title: Dosa Truck - Food Truck
typeOfFood: Lacto, Indian, Fast food, Take-out only, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Formerly all-veg but no longer as of spring 2012. Mobile food truck selling a few different flavors of dosas, an Indian crepe served with dips, with or without stuffing; plus masala spiced potato fries. Ghee is used, so vegans need to specify. Parks at various and changing locations, see website.
